bill.summary: 4/25/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Office of Personnel Management to establish a temporary program under which mandatory reductions in annuities for certain employees of the District of Columbia who voluntarily separate from service would be waived in connection with the District of Columbia's plans for downsizing its workforce.
